roleset.name: worry with direct object, causing worry, anxious about
roleset.note: WORRY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'worry' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'worrying' based on BOLT-4,5; adjectival 'worrisome' based on medi-seedcorpus. (from worry.01-v)
WORRISOME-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-Tmprl1to8. (from worrisome.02-j)
WORRIED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from worried.01-j)
WORRYING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from worrying.01-j)

roles.note: Use this sense when the worrier is the direct object of an active construction, or the subject of a passive construction. (from worry.01-v)

example.name: worry-v: straight transitive
example.text: Mr. Rowe also noted that political concerns also worried New England Electric.

example.name: worry-v: all args
example.text: John worried his mother with his habit of talking to strangers.
example.arg: with his habit of talking to strangers

example.name: worry-v: Passive with trace (when treebank decides to do it this way)
example.text: [the agency]-1 is worried *trace*-1 that a sharp market drop could create capital problems for the firms .
example.arg: that a sharp market drop could create capital problems for the firms.

example.name: worrying-j; empty it
example.text: It 's worrying that some people need more clarification past " vampires do n't exist " .
example.arg: that some people need more clarification past " vampires don't exist"

example.name: worrisome-j; arg0
example.text: She also had fluid mixed with hyperdense material within the uterine cavity without lymphadenopathy which-1 [*-1] was also worrisome .

roles.note: Use this sense when the worrier is the subject of an active construction. (from worry.02-v)

example.name: worry-v: worry about
example.text: John's mother worries constantly about her baby.

example.name: worry-v: worry that
example.text: Some economists and government officials seriously worried that it might collapse , producing panic among foreign investors and diminishing the flow of foreign capital to the U.S.
example.arg: that it might collapse, producing panic among foreign investors and diminishing the flow of foreign capital to the U.S.

example.name: treed as worry-n, so span doesn't allow outside annotation. Example to show active worrier.
example.text: Anyway, bosom buddies won't be able to stop your family from worrying

roleset.name: suggestive of a particular condition or outcome
roleset.note: WORRISOME-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-seed corpus. Relation to worry.01. (from worrisome.01-j)

role.descr: the condition/outcome possibly indicated by arg0

example.name: args 0,2
example.text: From reading up it appears that linear shape is worrisome of cancer.

example.name: worrisome-j
example.text: This is very worrisome for perigraft abscess formation .
